ValidationRule.description: Fields required on conversion: First Name, Phone or Mobile, Company Category, Address
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( IsConverted = true, OR( ISBLANK( FirstName ), ISPICKVAL(Company_Category__c , ''), ISBLANK( Address ), AND( ISBLANK( Phone ) , ISBLANK( MobilePhone ) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure First Name, Phone or Mobile, Company Category, and Address is populated on the lead.
